Blog.post: argh!!! today fell down.. hurtx.. then nvm.. ppl still laugh.. then when go down play, they call mi bai ka, lame..idiot.. then ppl imitate mi walking.. then we play true or dare.. not nice de..then i go cut hair arhgh!! i dun wan.. so short,. heyx. tml got ndp.. homework haven do yetx.. haix.. kk i go hw.. back now.. haix.. it is 4am already.. have done most of my maths.. hahax.. but still got chinese.. i not sure how to do.. argh!! help mi.. haix.. then nothing to tok de larhx.. hiax.. :'(.. wanna cry liaox..

today.. hahax.. went to school for choir practice.. haix.. sianz.. after choir.. hahax.. guess hu i saw.. my uncle, uncle jeffery.. hahax.. he become so fat..=x.. hahax.. then he send me go lot one larhx.. actually wanna go home de.. then 4get it larhx.. i ask him go lot onex... then i went to buy the 词语手册.. cuz no textbook.. hahax.. then i hug the pole.. while waiting for them larhx.. hahax.. then i go for piano lessons... funny worx.. never give teacher scold.. hahax.. then my sight singing... sux.. cannot help mahx..shhs.. i bought... lolipop..and kit kat.. hahax.. for sun de larhx.. hahax.. got ndp combined rehearsal... sure will become black black de..hahax.. going for dinner..then watch tv.. today arhx.. bez day larhx..hahax.. sort of only..:P

today arhx.. nothing to do.. i got up at 12 30pm.. hahax.. last night.. shiok arhx.. sleep so nice.. coolin day.. never go to papa's office.. i do hw mahx..kk larhx.. then today jas not online. miracle lehx.hahax.. then.. i at home nothing to do larhx. hahax.. kk.. now chatting larhx.. buaix.

today arhx... what a stupid day.. hahax.. the bus driver duuno where the place is.. it is so embarrasing lehx..came in late... then we still need to learn 6 more songs.. hahax.. 林俊杰 is singing the theme song bahx.. i also not so sure.. still got dance onex.. then for the pass few days.. headache mahx.. pain worx.. then kenna larhx.. hahax.. wasn't one of the six casualties.. hahax.. then when go home.. hahax.. nice.. later i going out to gather.. hahax.. the andy ong, pei zhen and yilin.. hahax.. they made a fool out of themselves.. haahx..not funny.. then the yihui... ugh!! irritating sia..keep tuggin mi de..i hate it.. wah laux.. she arhx.. pei zhen scold her liaox.. then she cry.. idiot.. she was the first one hu make mi angry de worhx.. i see her small then i never scold her horhx.. i try to hug the pole so i wun get tug off.. then she still keep pullin.. wah laux.. am i that good compared to the others? if i that good.. then... nahx..then arhx.. hahax.. kenna massaged by andy ong.. frightened sial..hahax.. but then quite good de mahx.. kekex.. hahax.. today ok larhx..

today.. sian larhx.. why all the choir members all like that de.. then all so the cannot get along with.. then i still wanna scold you guys.. teacher already very angry.. then you gals still can eat lolipop infront of the teacher..why muz they like that.. it was quite well larhx.. hahax.. quite enjoy... but then huiyi, eileen, manda owe me $3.30.. hahax.. very the calculative right?.. what to do? i also dunno hahax.. i sian larhx.. then after that when i came home from ryan's house.. i go piano lesson mahx.. then.. haix.. you say lehx.. kenna scolded my miss chan larhx.. i admit my fault larhx.. budden i really dunno how to play mahx.. i only noe the 1st song.. then you see arhx.. july and aug.. 4 wks away lehx.. then ms chan say if i cannot pass it then i fail worx..i dunno larhx.. but i will try.. to play the piano de mahx.. the whole thing is that i dun understand.. and i will always get interupted when i am playing the piano larhx.. pls larhx.. this ppl here cannot even keep quiet for 1 hour.. not even 1 min.. haix.. tell mi how can i ever study and play piano in this type of environment larhx..

haix.. why muz i go to school almost everyday?.. haix.. but can larhx.. then arhx.. luckily everyone choose huiyi as section leader..i no need so ma fan.. i no need to care bout every thing.. hahax.. heard that she have to memorise all the italian terms.. then dunno what need noe how to play piano or what.. luckily arhx.. me so stress up for the coming practical.. then no need to care bout all these.. hahax.. so happy.. then arhx.. cher say need to gib that luo han another chance.. but will she cherish it or not? then arhx.. haix.. from monday, always kenna pk complain.. if he kjuz shut up for a while i can have peace.. then arhx.. i sure tml die very 惨onez.. sure gib piano teacher scold.. haix.. too bad larhx..hu ask mi this year i got so many things on? then arhx... i go merit for my piano.. 85... wah laux.. ms koh bluff mi say i got 58 only... :s... why she like that dE?.. how would i noex?hahax.. kk larhx.. i go do hw liaox.. if not really no time to finishx.. erm...then.. ermx...i today not going for the bbq larhx.. i dun wanna go bcuz of some reasonx larhx.. i got to help my aunt to do report.. and lots more larhx..haix.. hope to have 1 more week/month of holidayx arhx.. so sian.. i think i also going to get sick also... keep on coughing.. not sick then what? kenna choke arhx.. |-_-|"' hahax.. kk larhx.. have to go start doing hw and practice piano liaox.. if not get scolding le larhx...

argh!!!;'( wanna cry liaoz..today i woke up late.. then i was like scolding everyone in the house.. then i took the buz... then arhz.. hahaz.. jiajun and ivnn was also in the buz... then reach school @ 7.15 larhz.. mi today odd one out.. eileen wif huiyi... jasmine with clarice.. then stepfanie with pearlynn.. arhz.. then me haf to be with one sec 1 de.. then she very vulgar.. haiz.. not my type.. then arhz.. today the cher say we "guai"... so let us off early.. haha..today.. actually quite fun larhz.. budden the streamers always land on my hair... haiz.. then the stick i also kenna whacked by it.. so sway.. haiz..nevermind larhz.. then arhz... i also always bleeding today larhz..first hand.. then leg.. haiz.. kk le larhz.. then i now go shower.. watch tv and by the same time i do my science larhz. siao de that teacher... ask us to copy the kep pointz... she cannot ask us to do smh better 的吗？ kk larhz.

today arhz.. nothing to do larhz.. but then haiz.. dunno what to do.. lazy to do my hw... maths do finish liaoz.. eng i lazy tocheck up the meaning.. haiz.. lazy larhz.. dunno what to do... haiz..hu wans to go for that bbq? none.. ugh!! me gonna kill ppl liaoz..nvm... muz lac..kkz.. tml got ndp.. hafta wake up early again... haiz..kk lorhz.. no pain no gain mahz.. hahaz.. lame.. aiya.. nvm larhz..

happy birthday to me sial.. hahax.. today in school.. was miserable..i hate it... but when i was at home.. hahx.. i am very happy lehx.. got 4 ppl come.. not 4... 5.. they are Andy Ong, Pei Zhen, YiLin and LiBing.. then Zhi Xiang came later to join the fun larhx.. hahax.. he got wet..budden the part which was the most idiot was when they slatter cream on me.. so irritating sial.. haahx.. budden enjoyed it..nice.. happy.. very the enjoy lorhx..haha.. i very happy.. cuz... a_ _ _.. arh.. nvm larhx.. kk gtg.. dad come liaox..

haix.. so long never update.. hahax.. i still got 4 more days to my birthday arhx... hahqax.. happy sehx. yesterday... we took the last bus home.. sianx.. haahx.. the bus so little ppl...haix.. then as so the sian larhx.. haf to wait for all the p5 to go away then we can go.. so idiot.. haix... then we i reach home at 1 lehx.. not fair.. then i still got hw to do sial.. haix.. unfair means unfair...

hahax.. so long never update liaox.. hahax.. today ndp combined rehearsal 3.. hahax.. next week NE show liaox..hahax.. today we got pom pom, gloves and hat.. hahax.. lame.. then so sad, heard that ivinn leaving lehx.. why? because of stephanie arhx.. if that's the case.. ask her to leave.. without her in choir is better then 5 losing 5 ppl that sings well what...haix...kk larhz.. i dunno what to write... but i enjoy it today larhx.. hahax..
